app_descript:
App Name: Video to MP3

Brief: Video to MP3 is an all-in-one media conversion tool designed to handle your video and audio editing needs with efficiency and ease. It caters to a variety of formats, ensuring that you can convert, cut, and customize your media files to your preference. This powerful app provides you with the capability to transform video files into high-quality MP3 audio, tailor audio and video clips as ringtones or alerts, and merge audio files seamlessly.
